plot: Snezhana Atanasova, a student at the State Music Academy, seeks her fulfillment in life as a performer of folk and pop songs. It's folklore that has given her the moral values so hard to find nowadays.
title: Zhiva pesen - Snezhana
plot_es: Snezhana Atanasova, a student at the State Music Academy, seeks her fulfillment in life as a performer of folk and pop songs. It's folklore that has given her the moral values so hard to find nowadays.
plot_en: Snezhana Atanasova, a student at the State Music Academy, seeks her fulfillment in life as a performer of folk and pop songs. It's folklore that has given her the moral values so hard to find nowadays.
